values: Amputation, Bruise, Burn, Concussion, Deafness, Dislocation, Foreign Body, Fracture, Hernia, Inflammation / Infection, Internal Injury, Laceration / Cut, Occupational Illness, Open Wound, Poisoning / Toxic Effect, Strain / Sprain Twist

name: Treatment
values: No First Aid Treatment, First Aid Treatment, Medical Treatment , Lost Time Injury, Fatal Injury

name: Event details / cause
values: Falls from height, Fall from same level, Hitting objects with body part, Exposure to mechanical vibration, Being hit by moving objects, Exposure to sharp sudden noise / long term noise, Exposure to extreme temps, Exposure to radiation, Exposure to biological factors, Exposure to mental stress factors, Vehicle accident, Muscular single / repetitive movement, Contact with electricity, Contact with toxic chemicals / substance, Other & multiple mechanisms of injury
